Additional genes in the deleted region probably contribute to the varied features of Miller-Dieker syndrome.",GHR,Miller-Dieker syndrome
Is Miller-Dieker syndrome inherited ?,"Most cases of Miller-Dieker syndrome are not inherited. The deletion occurs most often as a random event during the formation of reproductive cells (egg
